description: '''Daniel "Dee" Snider''' (born March 15, 1955) is an American musician, best known as the lead singer and songwriter of the [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band [[Twisted Sister]]. The band's 1984 song "[[We're Not Gonna Take It (Twisted Sister song)|We're Not Gonna Take It]]" reached  No. 2 on the [[UK singles chart]] and No. 21 on the [[Billboard Hot 100|''Billboard'' Hot 100]] singles chart and was ranked No. 47 on 100 Greatest 80's Songs. Snider later formed and was the lead singer in the heavy metal bands [[Desperado (band)|Desperado]], [[Widowmaker (American band)|Widowmaker]], and SMFs (Sick Mutha Fuckers). He also released several solo albums. Snider was ranked #83 in the ''[[Hit Parader]]''{{'}}s Top 100 Metal Vocalists of All Time.
